title: [K-12] STEM Microlearning for Improving Engineering Awareness Among Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: General Understanding of Fundamental Science and Engineering Design Processes
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program for pre-service science teachers to overcome stereotypes about engineering and engineers and strengthen STEM education competencies

learning_goals: Preservice science teachers improve gender stereotypes in engineering fields by over 80%.
Propose solutions for real-life problems by applying the five stages of the Engineering Design Process (EDP).
Develop at least three activities reflecting engineering thinking when designing STEM-integrated lessons.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
